sourcesContent:
The photos are loading

import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {AlbumsService} from "../albums.service"; import {Location} from "@angular/common"; import {Album, Photos} from "../models"; @Component({ selector: 'app-album-photos', templateUrl: './album-photos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album-photos.component.css'] }) export class AlbumPhotosComponent implements OnInit{ Photos: Photos[] loaded: boolean constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private albumService: AlbumsService, private location: Location) { this.loaded = true this.Photos = {} as Photos[] } ngOnInit(): void { const id = Number(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')); this.loaded = false; this.albumService.getPhotos(id).subscribe((photos => { this.Photos = photos; this.loaded = true })) } returnBack(): void{ this.location.back() } }
